PFootnote: Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.
RFootnote: Written to the Romans from Corinthus, and sent by Phebe servant of the church at Cenchrea.

PFootnote: The first epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas, and Fortunatus, and Achaicus, and Timotheus.
RFootnote: The first epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi by Stephanas, and Fortunatus, and Achaicus, and Timotheus.

PFootnote: The second epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.
RFootnote: The second epistle to the Corinthians was written from Philippi, a city of Macedonia, by Titus and Lucas.

PFootnote: Unto the Galatians written from Rome.
RFootnote: Unto the Galatians written from Rome.

PFootnote: Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.
RFootnote: Written from Rome unto the Ephesians by Tychicus.

PFootnote: It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.
RFootnote: It was written to the Philippians from Rome by Epaphroditus.

PFootnote: Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.
RFootnote: Written from Rome to the Colossians by Tychicus and Onesimus.

PFootnote: The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
RFootnote: The first epistle unto the Thessalonians was written from Athens.

PFootnote: The second epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.
RFootnote: The second epistle to the Thessalonians was written from Athens.

PFootnote: The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana.
RFootnote: The first to Timothy was written from Laodicea, which is the chiefest city of Phrygia Pacatiana.

PFootnote: The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.
RFootnote: The second epistle unto Timotheus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Ephesians, was written from Rome, when Paul was brought before Nero the second time.

PFootnote: It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.
RFootnote: It was written to Titus, ordained the first bishop of the church of the Cretians, from Nicopolis of Macedonia.

PFootnote: Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus, a servant.
RFootnote: Written from Rome to Philemon, by Onesimus, a servant.

PFootnote: Written to the Hebrews from Italy by Timothy.
RFootnote: Written to the Hebrews from Italy by Timothy.
